page.title: 12DUMPTONS' PUPILS
page.content: {DAY PUPILS A day pupils life starts at 8-45am when everybody goes into a short assemby and any messages are given. The lesson finishes at 10-00am when milk and biscuits are available to anyone who wants a snack. This is eaten during the three quarters of an hour break. They can also play in the wilderness or clean their desks. {BOARDING PUPILS A boarding pupil gets up at 7-30am. A child wishing to become a boarder can board from the age of eight upwards. They Â£3-5 a week and sweets given twice a week. A weekly letter is written to each parent by the child. The boarders may go to church if they wish to. Lessons are given at weekends as well, but the work is not too hard. Entertainments are available for the pupils, e.g.T.V. record players etc.,
